name: Metal Frog Solid : Road to Revenge
summary:
It's about time a certain frog has their revenge!

Buckle up for a large dose of first person mayhem as you become Metal Frog Solid. Rack up damage, complete revenge tasks, unlock new levels, and fulfill your destiny to become a God of the Metalverse. Get that adrenaline coursing through those webbed hands with different metal music in each level. Go the extra mile with endless mode and see just how much you can handle as it ramps up. Work your way up the leaderboards and compare with friends.

Whip...
